More information is available here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/kChcO\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"projects.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Review information how a New Project is created and managed in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/x/eo6yPQ\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project creation and management in projects.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Also make sure to study WI \\\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/download/attachments/378543447/EPM-HELP_WI_New%20Project%20Creation%20Procedure%20Desciption.doc?api=v2\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"New Project Creation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\" to learn the actions you will perform within a new project creation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"http://projects.epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask your mentor t\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"o practice New Project Related requests.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
